Introduction

Hwang Dongjun, known professionally as Brad, is a South Korean singer, rapper, songwriter, and music producer. He first gained recognition as a member of the boy group GHOST9, where he served as a main vocalist and rapper. After departing from the group in 2021, he took a break from the spotlight before reintroducing himself under the stage name Brad in 2025.

Before his group debut, he was active as a solo artist under the name $ept Rabbit, where he showcased his songwriting and producing skills. His music blends genres such as hip hop, R&B, and pop, often characterized by introspective lyrics and experimental production. As Brad, he made a comeback with a fresh sound and image, marking a new chapter in his artistic journey.

Brad is known for his reserved yet confident demeanor, a sharp creative vision, and a dedication to artistic independence. In addition to his solo work, he has also contributed behind the scenes as a producer for various other artists.
